entry.title: Bringing Hawaii to fine wine: The story of Freed Estate Winery
entry.summary: While Hawaii isn’t known for fine wine, Freed Estate Winery brings the island spirit to Oregon wine country. Located 20 minutes from Roseburg in the Winston area, this riverside vineyard has been producing wine for 25 years.
